content:
I didn't go out last night,
But I saw someone lurking outside my window,
It seemed they were curious about what was inside the house.
info: 闲聊-在家闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content: <color=#695c3a>The dead can't enter, and the living can't leave...</color>
info: 闲聊-在家闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊
闲聊-在家闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
A home that's completely my own...
I'm still getting used to it.
No worries, feel free to look around.
info: 闲聊-在家闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
If they scare you,
I'll take care of them.
info: 闲聊-在家闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
You wouldn't do so much for me
if you didn't care.
My home is yours for as long as you want to stay.
info: 闲聊-在家闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Because I can't be certain if the person outside the door
is really you.
Unlike the "Still Here" Oddities Shop, my home has no other protection.
info: 闲聊-在家闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
You liking to come to my place,
it's somewhat unexpected,
there's this saying... (thinking)
info: 闲聊-在家闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
At night, I keep my house dim and the curtains drawn,
protecting not just what's inside,
but what's outside as well.
info: 闲聊-在家闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
So...{短暂停}you probably don't know,
Even when I'm home, it's like I'm not there,
When you knock, I won't answer...
info: 闲聊-在家闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Oh, so you like things wild.
That's what I should say.
info: 闲聊-在家闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
It's only natural for people
to be curious about the unknown.
Oh, don't worry, no cats will be harmed here.
info: 闲聊-在家闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊
